lyric:
[ti:Perfect Duet (with Beyoncé)]
[ar:Ed Sheeran/Beyoncé]
[al:Perfect Duet (with Beyoncé)]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.37]Ed Sheeran & Beyoncé
[00:01.27]〈Perfect Duet〉
[00:01.66]Written by：Ed Sheeran/Beyoncé
[00:02.90]Ed Sheeran：
[00:03.09]I found a love for me
[00:10.62]Oh darling just dive right in and follow my lead
[00:18.19]Well I found a girl beautiful and sweet
[00:25.72]Oh I never knew you were the someone waiting for me
[00:32.08]
[00:32.28]'Cause we were just kids when we fell in love
[00:37.12]Not knowing what it was
[00:40.92]I will not give you up this time
[00:48.24]Darling just kiss me slow your heart is all I own
[00:56.09]And in your eyes you're holding mine
[01:01.55]
[01:02.83]Baby I'm dancing in the dark with you between my arms
[01:14.06]Barefoot on the grass listening to our favourite song
[01:21.13]When you said you looked a mess I whispered underneath my breath
[01:27.91]But you heard it darling you look perfect tonight
[01:34.82]
[01:41.20]Beyoncé：
[01:41.45]Well I found a man stronger than anyone I know
[01:49.20]He shares my dreams I hope that someday we'll share our home
[01:56.86]I found a love to carry more than just my secrets
[02:04.91]To carry love to carry children of our own
[02:11.04]
[02:11.14]We are still kids but we're so in love
[02:15.62]Fighting against all odds
[02:19.35]I know we'll be alright this time
[02:26.96]Darling just hold my hand
[02:30.58]Be your girl you'll be my man
[02:34.43]And I see my future in your eyes
[02:40.52]
[02:41.13]Baby I'm dancing in the dark with you between my arms
[02:52.71]Barefoot on the grass
[02:55.32]
[02:55.34]Both：
[02:56.26]We're listening to our favorite song
[02:59.29]
[02:59.32]Ed Sheeran：
[02:59.63]When I saw you in that dress
[03:02.59]
[03:02.69]Both：
[03:02.85]Looking so beautiful
[03:05.59]I don't deserve this darling you look perfect tonight
[03:13.44]
[03:26.64]Oh baby I'm dancing in the dark with you between my arms
[03:37.87]Barefoot on the grass we're listening to our favorite song
[03:45.22]I have faith in what I see
[03:48.60]Now I know I have met
[03:50.99]
[03:51.00]Beyoncé：
[03:51.09]An angel in person
[03:54.48]
[03:54.49]Both：
[03:54.67]And she looks perfect
[03:58.14]
[03:58.15]Ed Sheeran：
[03:58.49]I don't deserve this
[04:02.05]
[04:02.06]Both：
[04:02.38]You look perfect tonight
[999:00.00]***歌词来自第三方***
